content:
Thank you for your willingness to help! However, I think there might be some confusion. I'm the one who's been helping you with your questions and providing information on instructional design and language acquisition.

If you're ready to move forward, I'd be happy to assist you with the next step in your research. We could discuss how to apply the ADDIE model to your specific research project, or explore other topics related to instructional design and language acquisition.

Just let me know how I can help!
